title: Cuban guava cinnamon swirl soured cream Bundt cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '310g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '170g unsalted butter', '300g granulated sugar', '3 large eggs', '115g soured cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla paste', 'For the swirl', '3 tablespoons guava paste, cut into small cubes', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '3 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 tablespoons granulated sugar', 'For the glaze', '1 milk chocolate bar, melted', '65g icing sugar']
